links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (14,-59,70).
formula: a(n-2) = ((7^n - 2^n)/5-(5^n - 2^n)/3)/2. [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 05 2009]a(n) = 14*a(n-1) - 59*a(n-2) + 70*a(n-3), n>=3. -  Vincenzo Librandi, Mar 16 2011a(n) = 12*a(n-1) - 35*a(n-2) + 2^n, n>=2. - Vincenzo Librandi, Mar 16 2011
prog: (Sage) [((7^n - 2^n)/5-(5^n - 2^n)/3)/2 for n in xrange(2,21)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 05 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
